tool_description: Plans optimal sampling locations and depths based on site characteristics, project requirements, and geotechnical standards.

site_area_length.description: Length of the site area in meters

site_area_width.description: Width of the site area in meters

project_type.description: Type of construction project (foundation, road, embankment, retaining_wall, other)

error_messages: Invalid site dimensions: Site area length and width must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Unsupported project type: Use one of [foundation, road, embankment, retaining_wall, other].
Unknown standard: Use one of [ASTM_D1586, ISO_22476, BS_1377, other].
Invalid target depth: Depth must be a positive number between 1 and 100 meters.
usage: Provide site dimensions, project type, investigation standard, and target depth. The tool generates optimal sampling locations and depths based on geotechnical best practices.

total_locations.description: Total number of recommended sampling locations

location_coordinates.description: Array of coordinate pairs for each sampling location (x,y format)

sampling_depths.description: Array of recommended sampling depths in meters for each location

survey_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated survey plan
